alert.note: Alert for Crane; Pecos; Reeves; Ward (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 11 at 10:03PM CDT until September 12 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL PECOS...CENTRAL REEVES...WARD AND NORTHWESTERN CRANE COUNTIES... At 1002 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Thorntonville, or 8 miles southwest of Monahans, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...A 65 mph wind gust was observed in Pyote. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Pecos, Monahans, Thorntonville, Grandfalls, Barstow, Pyote, Wickett, Toyah Lake, Coyanosa, Imperial Reservoir, Pecos Municipal Airport, Roy Hurd Memorial Airport, Monahans Sandhills State Park, Royalty, B F Goodrich Testing Track, and Imperial. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 24 and 90. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with this storm will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
